text:
l Leukemia
															                    Treatment of relapsed or refractory hairy cell leukemia may include the following:         -  Chemotherapy.    -  Biologic therapy.    -  Targeted therapy with a monoclonal antibody (rituximab).    -  High-dose chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of a new biologic therapy.    - A clinical trial of a new targeted therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and targeted therapy with a monoclonal antibody (rituximab).        Check the list of NCI-sup
